item.description:
$7 Movie Tuesdays -Looper (2012)-Please get tickets at 6:25PM. --Movie Start time 6:45 PM.  We still meet at 6:30PM in Lobby to go in at 6:35 PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

 

Looper (2012): Details: Tn the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented - but it will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past, where a "looper" - a hired gun, like Joe (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) - is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good... until the day the mob decides to "close the loop," sending back Joe's future self (Bruce Willis) for assassination.

Looper (2012)got a amazing 93% on Rotten Tomatoes website!!...As thought-provoking as it is thrilling, Looper delivers an uncommonly smart, bravely original blend of futuristic sci-fi and good old-fashioned action See the reviews here: http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/looper/

Rated R - 2 hours long

Genres: Action & Adventure, Mystery & Suspense, Science Fiction & Fantasy

------------------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great action movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is NO  pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do not sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7 Movie Tuesdays -Looper (2012)
